description: Updates the AWS resources required to access the Amplify Admin UI.

parameters.name: LoginAuthConfig
parameters.description: Describes the Amazon Cognito configuration for Admin UI access. AwsCognitoIdentityPoolId (string) --- The Amazon Cognito identity pool ID used for the Amplify Admin UI login authorization. AwsCognitoRegion (string) --- The AWS Region for the Amplify Admin UI login. AwsUserPoolsId (string) --- The Amazon Cognito user pool ID used for Amplify Admin UI login authentication. AwsUserPoolsWebClientId (string) --- The web client ID for the Amazon Cognito user pools.

nested_params.name: AwsCognitoIdentityPoolId
nested_params.description: The Amazon Cognito identity pool ID used for the Amplify Admin UI login authorization.

nested_params.name: AwsCognitoRegion
nested_params.description: The AWS Region for the Amplify Admin UI login.

nested_params.name: AwsUserPoolsId
nested_params.description: The Amazon Cognito user pool ID used for Amplify Admin UI login authentication.

nested_params.name: AwsUserPoolsWebClientId
nested_params.description: The web client ID for the Amazon Cognito user pools.

nested_items.name: BackendManagerAppId
nested_items.description: The app ID for the backend manager.

nested_items.name: Error
nested_items.description: If the request fails, this error is returned.

nested_items.name: LoginAuthConfig
nested_items.description: Describes the Amazon Cognito configurations for the Admin UI auth resource to log in with.

nested_items.name: AwsCognitoIdentityPoolId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Cognito identity pool ID used for the Amplify Admin UI login authorization.

nested_items.name: AwsCognitoRegion
nested_items.description: The AWS Region for the Amplify Admin UI login.

nested_items.name: AwsUserPoolsId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Cognito user pool ID used for Amplify Admin UI login authentication.

nested_items.name: AwsUserPoolsWebClientId
nested_items.description: The web client ID for the Amazon Cognito user pools.
